comments:
Mattea Roach game 24.

Danielle Maurer ends Mattea's streak.

clues.clue: A 2017 headline about pictures of prince George said these 2 parents "release fresh prints of swell heir"
Akihito took over as emperor of Japan after the 1989 death of his father, this man
The residence of Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan of this nation on Borneo, cost hundreds of millions of dollars
Prince Hans-Adam II is the official head of state of all 39,000 people of this principality
In 2013 Duke of Brabant Philippe became king of this nation after his dad Albert II abdicated
George Lopez subtitled his 2009 comedy special "tall, dark &" this word meaning specifically Mexican American
It's the religion of most Bosniaks, the majority group in Bosnia & Herzegovina
Meredith Vieira has been named Woman of the Year by PAWA, which stands for this "American Women's Association"
Enjoy a fasnacht baked by this Mid-Atlantic group who, despite their name, largely came from what's now Germany
Singapore's population is about 75% Chinese & 15% this, also the peninsula Singapore lies off of
One type of the biodegradable S-shaped items called packing these is made of cornstarch
A padded couch pillow, or what you do to protect yourself from a fall
Say yes to this part of a dress that was Joan Collins' signature look on "Dynasty" in the 1980s, but has roots in the 1930s
As a verb, it means stepping up to the plate to hit; as a noun, it's layers of raw cotton used to line quilts
Drop the "ist" from a word for a boxer and you have this type of padded stick, used to simulate fighting with bayonets
Descargar means to do this, like data off the Internet
For our show, jeopardy.com is this, heimasíða in Icelandic
It's literally porta sul retro, but Italian hackers use this English term
It makes sense that la carte mère is this component
President Xi apologizes; his email left off the fù jiàn, this
This actor's famous feud with Jimmy Kimmel goes back about 15 years, but don't worry, it's all in good fun
Co-stars on "The Americans", she & Matthew Rhys officially became a real-life couple in 2014
He was the Marvel-ous writer, publisher & co-creator of such superheroes as Spider-Man & the Incredible Hulk
He pitched 7 no-hitters in his career, a record that still stands
Her numerous awards include a Grammy & several for Billboard & ASCAP Songwriter of the Year
This alliterative term for hastily skipping out on a restaurant bill
This word for viscous, often disgusting stuff that's also the name of a celebrity lifestyle brand
From a brand name, this "youthful" term for bite-sized chunks of shredded potato
"To catch" this, meaning to accomplish something rare & remarkable
This word for the sequences of digital records that underlie cryptocurrency transactions
It's the furthest north of the Great Lakes; appropriate, as it takes its name from the French for "upper lake"
Speakers' Corner & the Hudson Bird Sanctuary are part of this 340-acre London park, a former royal hunting preserve
From 1947 until 1959 this city just northwest of the Indus River delta was Pakistan's capital
One island in the Lesser Antilles is Antigua; another is this, named from the French for "eel" after its shape
This volcano that caused great devastation with its 1991 eruption is only about 50 miles from Manila
In her book "Tenderness", Alison MacLeod explores the origins & publication of this author's "Lady Chatterley's Lover"
Robert Graves' novel about a Roman emperor begins, "I, Tiberius" this name
The title of this Henryk Sienkiewicz classic that takes place during Nero's reign is Latin for "Where are you going?"
Title last name of Ross, a brooding hero of 18th century Cornwall in books by Winston Graham & 2 BBC series
A monk & a young novice investigate deaths at a monastery in this medieval murder mystery by Umberto Eco
The church of this U.K. country struggled over its form of church government but went full Presbyterian in the late 1600s
NBC stands for a pillar of the Black church, the National this denomination Convention
Part of the worldwide Anglican Communion, this denomination has more than 1.5 million members in the United States
John & Charles Wesley founded this "ism" in the 18th century
This "ism" that once dominated New England gets its name from being based on self-rule by small groups
Blue jeans... more specifically, 501 Original Fit
The 2005 LeSabre, sporting a V-6
renu contact lens solution
The 2600 "Video Computer System" for gaming, with a switch to select color or black-&-white TV
Techron Concentrate Plus fuel system cleaner
To show up somewhere you're not expected is to show up this way
It's a 500-year anniversary
Adjective describing a game in the NCAA when a team from the Pac-12 plays a team from the Big Ten
Someone between 90 & 100 years of age
The event where Mary found out the Holy Spirit was going to help her conceive
Fittingly, in 2015 on this TV drama, Olivia Pope finally admitted to the press that she was the president's mistress
Young Benjamin Braddock sleeps with Mrs. Robinson in this 1967 flick, then falls for her daughter
Robert Redford makes this title offer to Demi Moore & Woody Harrelson in a 1993 film; how dare he!
Infidelity abounds in "Y tu mama tambien", an early effort from this Mexican-born director
This directional actor played a straying husband for five season's on TV's "The Affair"

final_jeopardy.clue: These 2 mayors gave their names to a facility built on the site of an old racetrack owned by Coca-Cola magnate Asa Candler
